lemma parallel_fix_ind_inc: assumes adm: "adm (\<lambda>x. P (fst x) (snd x))" assumes base_fst: "\<And>y. P \<bottom> y" and base_snd: "\<And>x. P x \<bottom>" assumes step: "\<And>x y. P x y \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) y \<Longrightarrow> P x (H\<cdot>y) \<Longrightarrow> P (G\<cdot>x) (H\<cdot>y)" shows "P (fix\<cdot>G) (fix\<cdot>H)"
